bibl.title: The Egyptian Notary Offices in the Ptolemaic Fayyum.
Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007
bibl.author: ARLT, Carolin

bibl.note: Overview. - Introduction. - Hawara. - Tebtunis. - Philadelphia. - Memphis. - Geographical differences in the education of notary scribes. - Conclusions. - Pp. 24-25: The grammatodidaskalos.
ARLT Carolin, The Egyptian Notary Offices in the Ptolemaic Fayyum.

Sandra LIPPERT and Maren SCHENTULEIT (Edd.), Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007 (Wiesbaden, 2008) pp. 15-26.
